== Ubuntu Global Jam 2011 Zurich ==

=== Date and time ===

The Global Jam will happen on Friday the 1st of April 2011 at the ETH Zurich Main Building (Hauptgebaeude) / Room E 33.5 (30 seats), starting from 3.00 PM

Everybody who is interested in the below topics or in Ubuntu in general in invited to take part.

=== Topics ===

* Introduction to Unity
* Testing Unity 2D and 3D
* Reporting Bugs if some are found
* General chit-chat

Please feel free to add additional topics.

=== Attendance ===

It would be great if you could use <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/team/774/detail/|this page]]</nowiki> to register for the event.
